"The [Profound Darkness] Attacks":

[Profound Darkness] has resurrected
itself. <%me> must overcome
the fight against the [Profound Darkness].
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure Conditions: Become incapacitated
and selecting retire or time runs out"

"In the skies above Naberius, the
[Profound Darkness] has resurrected itself.
<%me> must overcome the fight against
the [Profound Darkness]."
"You'll be transported to the front soon. Your objective is to forge a path to the [Profound Darkness] by destroying Dark Falz [Double]."
"This enemy Dark Falz... we cannot even fathom the depths of its power. Be careful, and, please, come back to us safe and sound..."
"You've opened a path to the [Profound Darkness]. All that remains is for you to take down this powerful foe."

"We have no detailed orders or instructions for you. Fight bravely, and make it through this alive...
That's an order. That is an order!"
